nodes.text: Arkanian dragons were creatures capable of flight. They shared their name with the astronomical object Arkania.

When Governor Arihnda Pryce attempted to bring her parents with her during the Galactic Empire's siege of the Creekpath Mining and Refining complex on the planet Batonn, the Imperial Security Bureau agent Gudry referenced the creatures in a sarcastic remark, telling Pryce that her parents could not leave with them.
